payment.method_title: How would you like to pay?
payment.note_1: Make sure you have any e-wallet or mobile banking app that supports payment with QR code.
payment.note_2: A QR code will appear after you click 'Pay' button. Simply save or screenshot the QR code to complete your payment within the time limit.
payment.note_3: Please use the latest QR code provided to complete your payment.
payment.note_4: The card Issuer supports online payment and the credit limit/ account balance enough to cover the payment.
payment.note_5: A list of bank providers will appear after you click the pay button. Choose your card providers and enter the details required. Then complete your payment by following the verification steps.
payment.note_6: Present your hotel reservation form for the receptionist to confirm the information and cost.
payment.note_7: Payment at the hotel will be made in cash or credit/debit card.
payment.note_text: By continuing to payment, you have agreed to AHomeVilla and Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy

inquiry.title: How to Pay with QR
inquiry.text1: 1. Open your e-wallet or mobile banking application that supports QR payment with QuickPay, then scan the QR code above.
inquiry.text2: 2. Make sure the total amount and payment destination match the details above, then complete your payment within the time limit.
inquiry.text3: 3. Your booking will be automatically confirmed after a successful payment. You can check your booking status on the Bookings page.
